description: Their Diablo flannel’s thicker (warmer) counterpart, the Diablo-Alpinist adds wool to its soft, brushed-polyester construction. Born from the cold wind-gusts blowing off the Bering Sea, this road tested overshirt provides lasting comfort, breathability, storage, and now moveability, thanks to the Lycra® T400 Stretch.
name: Roark Diablo Alpinist Woven
